title: Easy Wins with  Mordekaiser (free elo)
body:
play him youll see hehehhehehehehhehh ty rito good balance hehehehhehe ty rito hehehehehhehehehehehehehe

P.S try To get as much elo as you can with him b4 they nerf him

replies.body: its amazing how many people cry when you pick him now, they think he is useless yet he just reks bot lane so easily. What can they even do unless they have a blitzcank lol and even then, just turn and e and keep walkin, you all g
stfu your telling people the secret to freelo

the q takes time to get off tho

(p.s. thus bork was born)
